title: REST API Development with Authentication
description: Generate a complete REST API with JWT authentication and best practices
prompt:
Create a REST API for [RESOURCE] with the following requirements:

Technical Stack:
- Language/Framework: [SPECIFY]
- Database: [SPECIFY]

Core Features:
- Complete CRUD operations
- JWT-based authentication
- Role-based access control
- Input validation and sanitization
- Comprehensive error handling
- Rate limiting
- Request logging
- API versioning

Security Requirements:
- Password hashing
- SQL injection prevention
- XSS protection
- CORS configuration

Please follow REST best practices and use proper HTTP status codes.
example: Create a REST API for a blog system using Node.js, Express, and MongoDB with JWT authentication
